formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: KE = \frac{1}{2} m v^2 \text{Solving for mass:}\quad m = \frac{2\,KE}{v^2} \text{Solving for velocity:}\quad v = \sqrt{\frac{2\,KE}{m}} \text{Momentum:}\quad p = m\,v
